name: Evolvace E2
description:
Evolved online real time showdown shooter.
　The marvelous battle between Evolvace E2s which surpass Evolvace begins.

　More unique battleships which evolved to E2.
　In addition to E2s, all E1s appear. Battle of the 12 battleships. Can you beat the E2s with the E1s?
　Solo, watch, local match, and world match are all featured.

　'Evolvace' was just the begining.
　The marvelous E2's appear!!! The overwhelming destructive power!!! Which battleship is the strongest???

　GuardaceRE E2・・・Cross RemzE2 equipped. Having both the high attack power and the high defensive ability.
　EvolvaceP E2・・・The docking type RemzP E2 equipped. Having the overwhelming destructive power.
　EvolvaceD E2・・・Hyper Gravity Shield equipped. Having the ultimate defensive system undetectable.
　EvolvaceR E2・・・Decimal RemzR E2 equipped. The strongest 360°Remz attack clear enemies up.
　EvolvaceS E2・・・New weapons equipped. A combination of a variety of attacks causes the ruinous destruction.
　EvolvaceM E2・・・The 2nd edition of Dark-matter Energy Generator equipped. Ruling the space, it gets the dark fort.

　Why do Evolvaces have to evolve?
　What is the new enemy that Guardace is menaced by.

　The conclusion of Resurrace trilogy!!!
